Articles.Content:
progress updates on the reentry heat?

Considering Nova\'s age, I\'d being willing to bet he\'s currently in school. Give him a bit.

Looks great, but it could really use some sort of effect in front of the capsule.

For example, a more static, teardrop shaped mesh with an animated 'fire' texture could do the trick. It would surround the capsule and become more pronounced with the reentry heat (just like the particle effect does). You could do that by manipulating alpha channel of the animated texture.

Yeah, I\'m thinking of trying that.

Zombi is right though, currently in class. ;P

Yeah, I\'m thinking of trying that.

Zombi is right though, currently in class. ;P

I\'m glad you have your priorities right!

KSP Forums first, 'learning' second!

Saw the heat video, then I was like

Although, the peaceful re-entry looks... too peaceful, you know?

Either way, it looks great.

Keep up the amazing work!
I\'ve been using Nova\'s mods since the very beginning, thank you and keep up the good work

Yeah, I\'m thinking of trying that.

Zombi is right though, currently in class. ;P

Lucky homeschooled person...

Lucky homeschooled person...

No, not that time. Either way, I\'m home now, time to get to work.
I must admit that since using Silisko\'s mods i\'ve found they are drama free and they just WORK,,Great attention to detail and seemless intergration = Winner,,Great stuff

Agreed, Nova\'s addons are always top-notch, you can tell how much work he puts into them. :cheers:
nova. I require your rentry code I wish to make KOSMOS parts do this 0_O pwease?
I want it too D:

nova. I require your rentry code I wish to make KOSMOS parts do this 0_O pwease?

Have patience, it\'s not nearly done. I want to make it so if you tumble your capsule, it burns up very quickly. Also, the effect needs to always point behind the ship (right now it will just be locked to the capsule)
why not hav several effects makign a ring around the bottom of the capsule.

PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT

I\'ve recently become aware that my DAE exporter was incredibly outdated, and as a result, nearly all my models are liable to import incorrectly (generating a dummy with the name of the object, and the object itself with '-Pivot' appended to its name. This shouldn\'t affect your average user, but I think anyone importing models to learn from them* should know!

*Not steal!
With that out of the way, though:
Wow.. how did you do the teardrop effect thing under the pod ?

Your packs are great !

The Probobo.....Prodobo...Bropodo... Pro-bo-do-bo-dyne is useful for all crafts. I\'m going to do Cassini-Hugyens probe and his lander

The BACE engine needs to be lighter, or more powerful, i can\'t use them on kerbin... And the re-entry heat looks soooooo great !
Awesome, even better than I imagined it.

The BACE engine needs to be lighter, or more powerful, i can\'t use them on kerbin...
